[00:00.00]Lose It - Kane Brown
[00:00.11]Lyricist：Kane Brown/Will Weatherly/Chase McGill
[00:00.22]Composer：Kane Brown/Will Weatherly/Chase McGill
[00:00.34]Yeah yeah yeah
[00:03.48]
[00:13.03]That little ringing buzzing good for nothing phone in your hands
[00:17.95]The directions to the party that's just started with that cover band
[00:22.89]
[00:23.41]That old school radio station let's just drive until it's faded
[00:28.05]Girl let's lose it tonight
[00:31.76]
[00:33.58]'Cause when you do that thing right there
[00:36.21]Flipping your hair baby I swear
[00:38.18]
[00:39.13]I don't think you know what you're doing to me you got
[00:41.99]My heart skip skipping a beat tonight
[00:44.50]Close enough to there's space between
[00:46.94]You and me let's lose it
[00:48.95]
[00:49.60]The way you're dancing swaying to the music
[00:52.85]Girl that body and how you move it
[00:55.47]Every time you 'cross my mind
[00:57.95]Girl I lose it
[00:59.32]Yeah I lose it
[01:00.75]

[00:03.48]
[00:13.03]小小的电话铃声毫无作用 你手中握着电话
[00:17.95]聚会的方向 以翻唱乐队的演出开场
[00:22.89]
[00:23.41]那个老式的广播站 让我们驾车直到消失吧
[00:28.05]女孩 让我们在今晚疯狂一次吧
[00:31.76]
[00:33.58]因为当你在这里做出那个动作时
[00:36.21]甩动着你的头发时 宝贝 我发誓
[00:38.18]
[00:39.13]我想你还不清楚你对我做了什么 你让
[00:41.99]我的心在今晚漏跳了一拍
[00:44.50]距离足够近 但仍有空隙
[00:46.94]在你我之间 让我们疯狂一次吧
[00:48.95]
[00:49.60]你的舞姿 随着音乐摇摆的样子
[00:52.85]女孩 那柔美的身姿 还有你舞动的样子
[00:55.47]每次你出现在我的脑海里
[00:57.95]女孩 我就失去了理智
